thread.title: Beverly Shilling
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Beverly Shilling

author: Beverly Shilling
title: Beverly Shilling
text: I ordered a single puzzle and a set of six puzzles for my mother who is house bound and one of her pleasures is doing puzzles. Imagine my surprise when they arrived in two days! She loves the ones and is already on her last one in the set of six! These are comparatively priced to store puzzles and I am looking forward to getting more from you. Thanks for helping to make my mother happy!
